description:
In Bunji`s group of friends who usually get along, Ma and Chi are having a rare fight. Bunji is perplexed as he is caught between two people who refuse to talk to each other; Having a dream of downing a cold beer at the restaurant on the summit of a mountain, Mom has come with the family to summit a mountain.  But with the cable car not moving, they decide to actually climb up the mountain...; Mom and the family decide to go to a BBQ place for dinner.  They are each going to do their own thing until it`s time to meet and then meet at the restaurant, but...; You can`t tell if Dad is listening to Mom`s daily gossiping or complaining about trivial things. But Mom shows no interest when Dad is into what happened in the baseball game...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kids` World / Crying Out Loud On Top of a Faraway Mountain / Big Family Operation / Couple`s Conversation
こどもの世界 / はるかなる山のおたけび / 家族大作戦 / 夫婦の会話
